skills.name: Install Fastify
skills.pattern: npm install fastify

skills.name: Basic Server
skills.pattern:
const fastify = require('fastify')({ logger: true });
fastify.listen({ port: 3000 }, (err) => { if (err) throw err });

skills.name: GET Route
skills.pattern: fastify.get('/', async (request, reply) => { return { hello: 'world' } });

skills.name: POST Route
skills.pattern: fastify.post('/api/users', async (request, reply) => { return request.body });

skills.name: Route Parameters
skills.pattern: fastify.get('/users/:id', async (request, reply) => { return { id: request.params.id } });

skills.name: Query Strings
skills.pattern: fastify.get('/search', async (request, reply) => { const { q } = request.query; return { query: q } });

skills.name: Route Options
JSON Schema
Schema Validation
skills.pattern: fastify.post('/user', { schema: { body: userSchema } }, handler);

skills.name: Register Plugin
skills.pattern:
fastify.register(require('@fastify/cors'));
fastify.register(require('@fastify/helmet'));

skills.name: Create Plugin
Plugin Prefix
skills.pattern: fastify.register(userRoutes, { prefix: '/api/users' });

skills.name: Hooks
skills.pattern:
fastify.addHook('onRequest', async (request, reply) => { /* auth check */ });
fastify.addHook('onSend', async (request, reply, payload) => payload);

skills.name: Hook Types
skills.pattern: onRequest, preParsing, preValidation, preHandler, preSerialization, onSend, onResponse, onError, onClose

skills.name: Decorate
Error Handler
Not Found
Serialization
skills.pattern: Fastify uses fast-json-stringify for 2-3x faster JSON serialization with schemas

skills.name: Pino Logger
skills.pattern:
const fastify = require('fastify')({ logger: true });
request.log.info('Processing request');

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.pattern:
import Fastify, { FastifyInstance } from 'fastify';
const server: FastifyInstance = Fastify();

skills.name: @fastify/cors
skills.pattern: fastify.register(require('@fastify/cors'), { origin: true });

skills.name: @fastify/jwt
skills.pattern:
fastify.register(require('@fastify/jwt'), { secret: 'supersecret' });
fastify.decorate('authenticate', async (req, reply) => { await req.jwtVerify() });

skills.name: @fastify/static
skills.pattern: fastify.register(require('@fastify/static'), { root: path.join(__dirname, 'public') });

skills.name: @fastify/multipart
skills.pattern:
fastify.register(require('@fastify/multipart'));
const data = await request.file();

skills.name: @fastify/swagger
skills.pattern: fastify.register(require('@fastify/swagger'), { openapi: { info: { title: 'API', version: '1.0.0' } } });

skills.name: Reply Methods
Async/Await
Encapsulation
skills.pattern: Plugins are encapsulated - decorations don't leak to parent scope unless using fastify-plugin

skills.name: Testing
skills.pattern:
const response = await fastify.inject({ method: 'GET', url: '/' });
expect(response.statusCode).toBe(200);

skills.name: Performance
skills.pattern: Fastify is one of the fastest Node.js frameworks, optimized for low overhead
